00019 enum SpatialSearchType { 
00020     SPATIAL_SEARCH_EQUAL,
00021     SPATIAL_SEARCH_OVERLAPS,

00023     SPATIAL_SEARCH_PROPER_SUPERSE,

00032 class FASTDB_DLL_ENTRY dbAnyContainer : public dbAnyReference {
00033   protected:
00034     dbFieldDescriptor* fd;
00035 
00036     void create(dbDatabase* db);
00037     void purge(dbDatabase* db);
00038     void deallocate(dbDatabase* db);
00039     void add(dbDatabase* db, dbAnyReference const& ref);
00040     void remove(dbDatabase* db, dbAnyReference const& ref);
00041     int  search(dbAnyCursor& cursor, void const* from, void const* till);
00042     int  prefixSearch(dbAnyCursor& cursor, char const* key);
00043     int  prefixSearch(dbAnyCursor& cursor, wchar_t const* key);
00044     int  spatialSearch(dbAnyCursor& cursor, rectangle const& r, SpatialSearchType type);
00045 
00046     dbAnyContainer(char const* fieldName, dbTableDescriptor& desc);
00047 };

00053 template<class T>
00054 class dbContainer : public dbAnyContainer {
00055   public:
00063     int search(dbCursor<T>& cursor, void const* from, void const* till) {
00064         return dbAnyContainer::search(cursor, from, till);
00065     }
00072     int search(dbCursor<T>& cursor, void const* key) {
00073         return dbAnyContainer::search(cursor, key, key);
00074     }
00075 
00082     int prefixSearch(dbCursor<T>& cursor, char const* key) {
00083         return dbAnyContainer::prefixSearch(cursor, key);
00084     }
00085 
00091     int search(dbCursor<T>& cursor) {
00092         return dbAnyContainer::search(cursor, NULL, NULL);
00093     }
00094 
00102     int spatialSearch(dbCursor<T>& cursor, rectangle const& r, SpatialSearchType type) { 
00103         return dbAnyContainer::spatialSearch(cursor, r, type);
00104     }
00105 
00109     void create() {
00110         dbAnyContainer::create(T::dbDescriptor.getDatabase());
00111     }
00112 
00116     void purge() {
00117         dbAnyContainer::purge(T::dbDescriptor.getDatabase());
00118     }
00119 
00123     void deallocate() {
00124         dbAnyContainer::deallocate(T::dbDescriptor.getDatabase());
00125     }
00126 
00131     void add(dbReference<T> const& ref) {
00132         dbAnyContainer::add(T::dbDescriptor.getDatabase(), ref);
00133     }
00134 
00139     void remove(dbReference<T> const& ref) {
00140         dbAnyContainer::remove(T::dbDescriptor.getDatabase(), ref);
00141     }
00142 
00147     dbContainer(const char* fieldName) : dbAnyContainer(fieldName, T::dbDescriptor) {}
00148     
00153     void create(dbDatabase* db) {
00154         dbAnyContainer::create(db);
00155     }
00156 
00161     void purge(dbDatabase* db) {
00162         dbAnyContainer::purge(db);
00163     }
00164 
00169     void deallocate(dbDatabase* db) {
00170         dbAnyContainer::deallocate(db);
00171     }
00172 
00178     void add(dbDatabase* db, dbReference<T> const& ref) {
00179         dbAnyContainer::add(db, ref);
00180     }
00181 
00187     void remove(dbDatabase* db, dbReference<T> const& ref) {
00188         dbAnyContainer::remove(db, ref);
00189     }
00190 
00196     dbContainer(dbDatabase* db, const char* fieldName) 
00197     : dbAnyContainer(fieldName, *db->lookupTable(&T::dbDescriptor)) {}
00198 };
